SELECT EMPL_NM, DUTY_NM, RANK_NM, WEEKDATE, COMM_TI, WORK_ST, TOTAL_TI, WORK_PL FROM (SELECT EMPL_NM,DUTY_NM,RANK_NM,WEEKDATE,COMM_TI,WORK_ST,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ${worderKeyword} ${orderMethod}) RNUM,TOTAL_TI,WORK_PL FROM (SELECT EMP.EMP_NM AS EMPL_NM, DUTY.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NM, RANK.RANK_NM AS RANK_NM, LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(DAILY.REG_DT,'DY'),',')WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY DAILY.REG_DT)AS WEEKDATE, LISTAGG(DAILY.ONW_TI || '~' || DAILY.OFFW_TI,',')WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY DAILY.REG_DT) AS COMM_TI, LISTAGG(DAILY.WORK_ST,',')WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY DAILY.REG_DT) AS WORK_ST, SUM(ROUND(((TO_DATE(DAILY.OFFW_TI,'HH24:MI')-TO_DATE(DAILY.ONW_TI,'HH24:MI'))*24))-DAILY.REST_TI) AS TOTAL_TI, PLACE.PLACE_NM AS WORK_PL FROM WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ = EMP.EMP_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_DUTY_MGM DUTY ON EMP.DUTY_SEQ = DUTY.DUTY_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_PLACE_MGM PLACE ON EMP.PLACE_SEQ = PLACE.PLACE_SEQ INNER JOIN WEB_RANK_MGM RANK ON EMP.RANK_SEQ = RANK.RANK_SEQ
GROUP BY EMP.EMP_NM,DUTY.DUTY_NM,RANK.RANK_NM,PLACE.PLACE_NM ))WHERE RNUM between ${rowStart} and ${rowEnd} ORDER BY ${worderKeyword} ${orderMethod}
select count(DISTINCT EMP.EMP_NM) from WEB_DAILY DAILY INNER JOIN WEB_EMPL_MGM EMP ON DAILY.EMP_SEQ=EMP.EMP_SEQ
